DOC.brief_summary: The Swedish Mammography Cohort begin 1987-1990 , 66,651 woman live two county central Sweden complete mailed questionnaire include item diet , parity , age first child 's birth , history breast cancer family , weight , height , education . Follow-up questionnaire send 1997 2008-09 .
DOC.detailed_description: From 1987 1990 population-based mammography screen program introduce two county central Sweden . In VÃ¤stmanland County woman born 1917 1948 receive mail invitation screen mammography March 1987 March 1989 ( n=41,786 ) together 6-page questionnaire ; 31,735 woman ( 76 % ) return complete questionnaire . In Uppsala County woman born 1914 1948 invite screen receive questionnaire January 1988 December 1990 ( n=48517 ) ; 34916 woman ( 72 % ) return complete questionnaire . Hence , questionnaires complete undergoing mammography obtain 66,651 woman ( 74 % ) source population . These questionnaire include item diet , parity , age first child 's birth , history breast cancer family , weight , height , education . In 1997 second questionnaire send cohort member still live study area . The questionnaire update information diet extend include information physical activity , medical history , age menarche , history oral contraceptive use , age menopause , postmenopausal hormone use lifestyle factor cigarette smoke history use dietary supplement . Majority question questionnaire validate . During 2008-09 , exposure information update extended send two new questionnaire - one questionnaire health include several sign symptom , sleep , social relation etc ( 2008 ) one diet , dietary supplement use , lifestyle factor ( 2009 ) . Incident case cancer ascertain record linkage study population National Swedish Cancer Register Regional Cancer Registers . Cardiovascular disease well surgery cause death identify linkage National Inpatient registries Swedish Board Health Welfare . Ascertainment cancer case diseases almost 100 % complete . Dates death ascertain Swedish Death Register ( 100 % complete ) , information date move study area obtain linkage Swedish Population Register .
DOC.criteria: All woman bear 1914 1948 , live central Sweden
